description.short: Cooking app with live classes, recipes, and smart kitchen device integration for Food Network.
description.full: Food Network Kitchen was a subscription-based cooking app featuring live and on-demand cooking classes from Food Network stars, step-by-step recipes, and integration with smart kitchen appliances. The app allowed users to watch celebrity chefs cook in real-time, follow along with interactive recipes, and control compatible smart ovens and displays directly from the app. Available on iOS, Android, Fire TV, and web.

challenge.context: Building TV apps with complex video streaming and smart device integrations required specialized expertise.
challenge.response: Improved Fire TV application with smarter image caching capabilities and fixed Amazon Fire TV integration for long videos.
details: Fire TV app development with TV-optimized UI
Cross-device synchronization between mobile and TV

achievements.title: Amazon Fire TV Application
achievements.problem: Users needed to follow cooking classes on a large screen while working in the kitchen.
achievements.solution: Improved dedicated Fire TV app with TV-optimized navigation and video playback. (RecyclerView view holder architecture re-work)
details: Fire TV app with D-pad navigation optimized for remote control
Live streaming video player with DVR-like controls
Browse recipes, classes, and chef profiles on big screen
Integration with mobile app for seamless experience

achievements.title: Chromecast Integration
achievements.problem: Users without Fire TV needed a way to watch on their TV.
achievements.solution: Implemented Chromecast casting from mobile app to any Chromecast-enabled TV.
details: Cast live and on-demand video content
Mini controller and expanded controller UI
Seamless handoff between mobile and TV

achievements.title: Live Streaming Video Player
achievements.problem: Live cooking classes required reliable, low-latency video streaming.
achievements.solution: Built custom video player with live streaming support and interactive overlays.

lifecycle.discontinuationReason: Discovery discontinued the Food Network Kitchen app in March 2021, shifting focus to other digital products. The app's features were partially integrated into the main Food Network app.
